mapper.select: select g_no, act_local_no, pups_no, name, reg_dt, logo, intro, max_cnt, view_cnt from gms_group order by g_no desc

select g.g_no, g.act_local_no, g.pups_no, g.name, g.reg_dt, g.logo, g.intro, g.max_cnt, g.view_cnt, p.pups_no pno, p.name pname, a.act_local_no, a.name_si asi, a.name_gu agu from gms_group g inner join gms_purpose p on g.pups_no=p.pups_no inner join gms_activelocal a on g.act_local_no=a.act_local_no where a.name_si like #{activeLocal.nameSi} order by g.g_no desc;

select g.g_no, g.act_local_no, g.pups_no, g.name, g.reg_dt, g.logo, g.intro, g.max_cnt, g.view_cnt, p.pups_no pno, p.name pname, a.act_local_no ano, a.name_si asi, a.name_gu agu from gms_group g inner join gms_purpose p on g.pups_no=p.pups_no inner join gms_activelocal a on g.act_local_no=a.act_local_no where a.act_local_no = #{activeLocal.no} order by g.g_no desc;

select * from (select g.g_no, g.act_local_no, g.pups_no, g.name, g.reg_dt, g.logo, g.intro, g.max_cnt, g.view_cnt, p.pups_no pno, p.name pname, a.act_local_no ano, a.name_si asi, a.name_gu agu from gms_group g inner join gms_purpose p on g.pups_no=p.pups_no inner join gms_activelocal a on g.act_local_no=a.act_local_no where a.act_local_no = #{activeLocal.no} order by g.g_no desc) g where g.pups_no = #{purpose.no}
select g_no, act_local_no, pups_no, name, reg_dt, logo, intro, status, stop_dt, max_cnt, memb_cnt, view_cnt from gms_group where g_no=#{no}
select g_no, act_local_no, pups_no, name, reg_dt, logo, intro, max_cnt, memb_cnt, view_cnt, status, stop_dt from gms_group where g_no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into gms_group ( act_local_no, pups_no, name, logo, memb_cnt, max_cnt, intro) values(#{activeLocalNo}, #{purposeNo}, #{GroupName}, #{logo}, 1, #{maxCount}, #{intro});
insert into gms_join_memb ( memb_no, g_no, g_memb_grd_no) values(#{memberNo}, #{groupNo}, #{gradeNo});
